name: Xero
description: A Software Engineer at the cloud accounting company Xero. I develop full stack, secure, scalable code that powers the Invoicing platform. Our mission is to help the millions of small business Xero customers get paid.

name: CR Automation
description: An Engineering Intern at the automation engineering firm CR Automation. I was tasked with building a business intelligence agent that would send and receive data from multiple sources concurrently.
